name: Aavegotchi
tagline: Digital frens for the crypto generation
summary: Aavegotchi is a DeFi-focused non-fungible token (NFT) that runs on the Aave protocol. Simply put, Aavegotchis are game avatars that can be used as DeFi collateral to earn staking rewards
